action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the entity being ridden.
action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the entity being ridden.

bientity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on either the 'actor' (the passenger entity) or the 'target' (the entity being ridden) or both.
bientity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on either the 'actor' (the passenger entity) or the 'target' (the entity being ridden) or both.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, only execute the specified actions if this condition is fulfilled by either the 'actor' (the passenger entity) or the 'target' (entity being ridden) or both.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, only execute the specified actions if this condition is fulfilled by either the 'actor' (the passenger entity) or the 'target' (entity being ridden) or both.

recursive.description: If set to `true`, the specified action(s) will be executed on all entities that are being ridden.
recursive.markdownDescription: If set to `true`, the specified action(s) will be executed on all entities that are being ridden.
